CCNx Technical Working Group

The CCNx Technical Working Group (TWG) is a biweekly teleconference where we discuss people, places, and things! It is open to the public. To attend, please use the dial-in information below.

Dial-in number: 1-800-268-4017
Participant code: 3768636189

Notes from each meeting are recorded and published below for posterity. They are also broadcast to the CCNx and ICNRG mailing lists for visibility.

  • Notes April 16, 2016
